title: How to Check Your Uber Passenger Ratings
sub_head: How many five-stars? How many one-stars? Uber now breaks down all your rider ratings, and lets you submit a request for a more detailed profile of your rides.
body:
You might think youâ€™re the perfect Uber passenger. But spoiler alert: A few drivers in your past probably thought you were awful.
On Wednesday, Uber released a way for riders to find out how many embarrassing one-star ratings they received, how many glowing five-star ratings they got, and how many were somewhere in between. Previously, you could only see an average score based on how your drivers rated you.
